TopicTitle: [1.2.x] [1.4 in Development] Real KSC in KSP Dev Continued

Articles.Content:
> 
> You need both KK and RSS in order to place the statics and not have them appear giant and 500m underground.

 Why are they exactly 500m underground?
Also they aren't really that big. They can fit 5m rockets at least.

> 
> Why are they exactly 500m underground?
> Also they aren't really that big. They can fit 5m rockets at least.

I was exaggerating to make a point. The models do appear under ground in stock KSP, how far under I do not know.
barge anybody??!?!?

> barge anybody??!?!?

 No. No barge. Barges move.
Unless you want to make a SpaceX barge...
